html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01612025-02-25ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectCertain Products Containing Toxic Substances Regulations
PrecisCERTAIN PRODUCTS CONTAINING TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the manufacture and importof certain sealant products containing coal tars and certain sealant products containing polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons whose total concentration exceeds 1000parts per million ; and (2) provide a temporary exemption for the sale of coal tar-based sealant products for industrial use on metal, structural steel or concrete components or on pipelines or other buried services.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0036 Publication Date: 2025-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CERTAIN PRODUCTS CONTAINING TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the manufacture and importof certain sealant products containing coal tars and certain sealant products containing polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons whose total concentration exceeds 1000parts per million ; and (2) provide a temporary exemption for the sale of coal tar-based sealant products for industrial use on metal, structural steel or concrete components or on pipelines or other buried services.
